name: Banjo-Kazooie: Legend of the Crystal Jiggy
summary:
Every hero has a story, but some have many. It's time for the bear and bird next adventure, they are finally back! Banjo and Kazooie must search for the Crystal Jiggy, with which power Grunty is back.

Legend of the Crystal Jiggy is a full new adventure created by JacksonGameStudios, the studio responsible for other rom hacks such as Banjo-Threeie and Banjo-Kazooie: The Final Mission.
